overview: Jack a high school drop out who now lives in the back on a converted van meets up with an old friend Jesse – since he left school they have been slowly growing apart – with Jack wanting to re build his life and his friendship with Jesse they walk and talk and the night grows on truths that are slowly revealed like why Jack left school to become a nobody; and fate slowly haunts the over looming truth of both friends future that will be changed forever
tagline: a dream? a perception? a reality? or just fate?
title: Grown Apart
